verbs.description: as this sonoma county land preserve heals from the devastating tubbs fire so too [V: does] its steward an ecologist at pepperwood preserve north of santa rosa has thrown herself into her work after her in - laws died in california most destructive wildfire as she watches the land heal itself she is also collecting information that could help future generations build more resilient communities advisory council los angeles times leroy tubbs sonoma county california donna santa rosa dave halbur leroy halbur mark west springs mark west springs california sonoma county california
